alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Randolph (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 7:40PM CDT until March 26 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN RANDOLPH AND NORTH CENTRAL CHAMBERS COUNTIES... At 740 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Roanoke, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Roanoke, Post Oak Forks, Standing Rock, Welch, Rock Mills, Big Springs, Paran and Roanoke Municipal Airport. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
